name: VocabKing
skdetail:

Invocation Name: vocab king
des:
With the help of the Vocab King, you can learn vocabulary for your field of choice. It doesn't matter whether you're studying for school or studying abroad. 
The specific vocabulary allows you to concentrate fully on your field of study and you don't have to acquire a vocabulary that you don't need anyway. 
Thereby the vocab king tells you the German terms for which you have to provide the English translation in a continuous loop. This direction is necessary for Alexa to understand you properly. 
If you prefer to learn the other way around, you must set your Alexa to German. 

The following learning categories are currently available: 
-vacation 
-economy 
-computer science 

In order for you to learn as efficiently as possible, we have integrated the Spaced Repetition System (SRS).
This is a scientifically proven system that remembers which vocabulary you already know and which you do not.
Thus only those vocabulary are queried which you either don't know yet or haven't answered for a long time.
If you have an Echo Show, you will be visually supported to achieve even better learning results on top. 
So, let's go, show the world what you're made of and become the vocabulary king! 
Just like you, we want to constantly improve ourselves. For this we depend on your feedback and would be pleased about constructive criticism and improvement suggestions :-).
